summary: Easily create an MCM menu mod and script, without even opening the Creation Kit!
descriptionHtml:
This little program makes creating MCM based mods as simple as coming up with a name. It will generate a .esp file, and a .psc file that you can edit and compile. Then just drag and drop the files into your data folder, and voila. Well, you still need to activate the .esp in your launcher or NMM.

V0.9.1 - The MCM menu name is now the same as the mod, instead of the script. Derp.
V0.9.0 - will remain alpha until I get some feedback, but it can't possibly ruin your PC so feel safe using it.

Installation: Just unzip, then run MCM Mod Maker.exe.

Usage: Enter your mod's name, the script name, and click 'Create'. It will generate a Data folder full of the .esp, and the ScriptsSource .psc file, all in the same directory as the .exe file.
author: vwr
